e: ￹`O~ `ka~`patay~`an~ `nira~ `a~ `romi'ad~￺the day he died￻他死亡的日期
￹`Papipa~`tayen~ `cingra~ `to~ `'ada~ `ako~.￺Make him / have him kill my enemy.￻叫他殺死我的敵人
￹`O~ `pa~`patay~`en~ `cingra~.￺He must be killed.￻他是要被槍斃的人
￹`Ma~`patay~ `to~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `ako~.￺I have lost my spirit.￻我的心已死了
d.f: ￹￺figurtatively to be crushed and despair￻比喻希望被粉碎和絕望

e: ￹`patay~ `sa~`~ `a~ `mi~`simed~ `to~ `patelac~￺search to protect ones reputation from scrutiny￻他極盡掩飾他的錯誤
d.f: ￹￺to go to extreme limits to do something￻極盡限制去做某些事情
